    • Constructor Detail

      • InstagramTask

        public InstagramTask(processing.core.PApplet applet,
                     String searchParam,
                     ImageList imageList,
                     Instagram instagram,
                     boolean runOnce,
                     long delay,
                     boolean lazyLoad)
        Constructs a new InstagramTask.
        Parameters:
        applet - The Processing PApplet.
        searchParam - The search parameter.
        imageList - The ImageList object.
        instagram - The Instagram object.
        runOnce - If the value is set to true, the loader will only run once.
        delay - The delay between two loading tasks. (milliseconds)
        lazyLoad - Indicates if the load process is lazy or not. Use lazy mode to save memory space.
